00030 static struct timeval timereset;
00031 static SERIALPORTCONFIG ssc32serialportconfig;

00045 int robot_init(void)
00046 {
00047         int status;
00048         
00049         gettimeofday(&timereset, NULL);
00050  
00051         // Porta serial COM1 à qual está conectada a placa SSC-32:
00052         if ( (status=serialcom_init(&ssc32serialportconfig, 1, 115200) ==  SERIALCOM_SUCCESS)){
00053                 printf("\n %s: porta seriam COM1 iniciada com sucesso",__FUNCTION__);
00054         } else {
00055                 printf("\n %s: porta seriam COM1 com erro de código %i",__FUNCTION__,status);
00056                 return 0;
00057         }
00058 
00059         // Retorna 
00060         return 1; 
00061 }                      
00062 
00070 int robot_close(void)
00071 {
00072         // Porta serial COM1 à qual está conectada a placa SSC-32:
00073         serialcom_close(&ssc32serialportconfig);
00074         
00075         // Retorna 
00076         return 1; 
00077 }

00080 /*****************************************************************************
00081 ******************************************************************************
00082 ** Funcoes de interface
00083 ******************************************************************************
00084 *****************************************************************************/
00091 int robot_get_time(float *ptime)
00092 {
00093         struct timeval time;
00094 
00095         gettimeofday(&time, NULL);
00096         *ptime = ((time.tv_sec - timereset.tv_sec) + (time.tv_usec - timereset.tv_usec)*1e-6);
00097         
00098         return 1;
00099 }
00100 
00107 int robot_set_servos_move(servomovecommand_t *pservomovecommand)
00108 {
00109         int i;
00110         char ssc32msg[200];
00111         
00112         // Converter a estrutura de comando em mensagem para a placa ssc-32:
00113         ssc32msg[0] = '\0'; // inicia vazio.
00114         for(i=0;i<ROBOTPROTOCOL_SERVOCOMMANDS_MAXSERVOS;++i){
00115                 if(pservomovecommand->pulse_us_mask[i]){
00116                         if(strlen(ssc32msg)!=0){
00117                                 sprintf(ssc32msg,"%s ",ssc32msg);
00118                         }
00119                         sprintf(ssc32msg,"%s#%i P%i",ssc32msg,i,pservomovecommand->pulse_us[i]);
00120                         if(pservomovecommand->pulse_speed_us_per_s_mask[i]){
00121                                 sprintf(ssc32msg,"%s S%i",ssc32msg,pservomovecommand->pulse_speed_us_per_s[i]);
00122                         }
00123                         if(pservomovecommand->pulse_timeformove_ms_mask[i]){
00124                                 sprintf(ssc32msg,"%s T%i",ssc32msg,pservomovecommand->pulse_timeformove_ms[i]);
00125                         }
00126                 }
00127         }
00128         sprintf(ssc32msg,"%s%c",ssc32msg,13); // carriage return
00129 
00130 //      printf("\n *** robot_set_servos_move msg: %s",ssc32msg);
00131         
00132         // Enviar comando:
00133         serialcom_semwait(&ssc32serialportconfig); // reserva a porta serial para a thread que chama essa função
00134         for(i=0;i<strlen(ssc32msg);++i){
00135                 serialcom_sendbyte(&ssc32serialportconfig,(unsigned char*)(&ssc32msg[i]));
00136         }
00137         serialcom_semsignal(&ssc32serialportconfig); // liberar a porta serial para ser usada por outra thread
00138 
00139         return 1;
00140 }
